capability.name: Case Root Cause Analysis
capability.definition: Root cause analysis business function reviews case reports to identify possible improvements to eliminate/mitigate servicing issues
capability.role: Analyze customer servicing case resolution records for root cause insights. Analysis can be focused for more specific analysis including: problematic product and service features that can be refined; possible operational weaknesses that might require improved training/guidelines; and, to detect possible credit/fraud patterns
capability.example: Contact center case resolution records are reviewed to identify recurring issues that can be resolved with improved servicing representative training and guidelines

key_features.name: Product and service feature related issue analysis
key_features.description: Enables product and service feature related issue analysis to support root cause analysis business function reviews case reports to identify possible improvements to eliminate/mitigate servicing issues

key_features.name: Servicing and operational performance issue analysis
key_features.description: Enables servicing and operational performance issue analysis to support root cause analysis business function reviews case reports to identify possible improvements to eliminate/mitigate servicing issues

key_features.name: Credit and fraudulent behavior analysis
key_features.description: Enables credit and fraudulent behavior analysis to support root cause analysis business function reviews case reports to identify possible improvements to eliminate/mitigate servicing issues
